availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth "Betsy" T. Harford. Father of Sarah Harford, William Harford, Thomas Harford, Ann Eliza Harford, Taylor Harford, Henry Harford, Argula Harford, and Edna Harford. Farmer in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p. 289.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Drennan's Ridge, p. 269B.
